ComicInfo.Summary: Forces are driving the masses to embrace Savage Dragon as their candidate of choice. Things are not right in Washington as the President of the United States spends the few days leading up to the impending election readying the country for war: a war with the super-powered beings that police the very planet. But things are not always what they seem, and the President is in more danger than he, or anybody else, knows. Plus, an all-new Rock vs. Zeek yarn by Erik Larsen and Frank Fosco.
ComicInfo.Title: Bushwacked!; When Titans Clash; Comic Bits
